website_summaries.verdict: An affordable choice for those who want to try FurReal Friends without spending a lot of money. Cute and has a few entertaining interactions.
pros: Soft fur and a sweet face make this adorable baby monkey appealing to youngsters
Comes with toy stethoscope and thermometer, and makes cute sounds when being "examined."
cons: Not quite as interactive as higher-priced options, and has fewer movements and responses

customer_reviews.title: Cutest toy ever
customer_reviews.text: My son got it for Xmas and loves it. It sleeps in bed with him every night. Sucks it's thumb and fur is super soft. This thing is so cute I want to be a kid again so I can play with it. Lol. Its eyes are huge and cute, it makes the cutest little coughing and kissing sounds ever. It coos and you can hear her heart beat. The doctor check-up part, stethoscope and thermometer my son kinda lost interest in after a couple days. But even after those things get lost, (kids always lose that stuff right away), they can still play with the monkey.
customer_reviews.author: Mommyof2boys

customer_reviews.title: Super cute
customer_reviews.text: This has become my default gift for kids - both boys and girls. It's super cute and entertaining. Received great reviews from a 2-year-old boy as well as a 6-year-old girl.
customer_reviews.author: Jenna W

customer_reviews.title: My daughter loves this monkey!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased as a gift for my 3 year old who would not stop talking about "check up monkey" after we saw it in a store. She loves it! She plays with it all the time make sure she's not "sick" and she just loves the stethoscope it comes with. The monkey makes noises when you do certain things so she feels as if she really is taking care of a baby monkey!
customer_reviews.author: Dillon

customer_reviews.title: Cute Monkey / Doctor Toy
customer_reviews.text: I bought the furRel Check-u Zandi as a gift for my niece, and she loves it. It is interactive for a 2 year old, it makes noise, and keeps her entertained. She can "check up" on the monkey with the included accessories to see if it is feeling ok .. and it is really a cute toy.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa C.

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I'm early Christmas shopping and came across this. I thought my 2 year old would love this so I ordered it and when I received it, it was everything I thought it would be.
customer_reviews.author: Rose N.

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT
customer_reviews.text: My two yr old loves this monkey!!! Only downfall is I don't believe it has an on/off switch. He likes to sleep with the monkey and if he moves in the night, it goes off lol. Other than that he is addicted to carrying it around and listening to his heartbeat
customer_reviews.author: Dawn

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for those who are exploring their imaginations
customer_reviews.text: My 2 year old is beginning to become more imaginative and with this toy, he now loves playing doctor. He loves that it’s a monkey and all the sounds and noises it makes. My only issue is when I was taking the stethoscope out, it broke. I was able to fix it!
customer_reviews.author: Morgan McGregor

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed
customer_reviews.text: After reading the reviews for this, I expected my grandson to be able to interact more with it. It comes with a non functioning stethoscope and thermometer . It makes noises which honestly are a little bizarre. Don't waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: Franny

customer_reviews.title: Defective? If not, not worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: The reviews made me believe this was somewhat interactive. I’m not sure if we got a dud but this just coos when the belly button is pushed. It looks like the eyes can close but ours doesn’t. Not worth the cost.
customer_reviews.author: L. hughes

customer_reviews.title: Cute but defective
customer_reviews.text: Monkey make a couple sounds but often just makes an annoying clicking noise. Clearly was sent A defective item, there is no way this is normal?
customer_reviews.author: ST

customer_reviews.title: GREAT ITEM FOR A TODDLER AND OLDER.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my granddaughter and it's one of her favorite toys! It's sweet and she loves that she can interact with Zandi.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cute my daughter loves it
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this little doll!! Shipped quick and arrived in great condition. I would recommend for any little one
customer_reviews.author: mindyluu

customer_reviews.title: Little Boy Loved It!
customer_reviews.text: It was a cute, entertaining Christmas gift for a little boy who loves stuffed things. He even had to sleep with it.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Dietrich

customer_reviews.title: Adorable and Useful
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome toy for a vet center for kids.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher

customer_reviews.title: Birthday gift was loved.
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my niece, she really liked it!
customer_reviews.author: Victoria Anne Moore

customer_reviews.title: Bought 1 then another!
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for not 8 year old and turned back around and bought one for my 2 year old.
customer_reviews.author: Megan Parker

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: This is adorable. It makes cute little noises and my daughter absolutely loves it. There has been no issues with it so far.
customer_reviews.author: Hayley

customer_reviews.title: Comes with 2 doctor tools
customer_reviews.text: I got this as a birthday gift for my daughter. She absolutely loved it. It makes sounds with the objects it is holding and keeps her very entertained.
customer_reviews.author: Kayla

customer_reviews.title: Great for my 4 y/o!!
customer_reviews.text: This is so cute! My 4 y/o loves it. It makes cute noises and is fun to play with.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Flores

customer_reviews.title: Cute and affordable gift
customer_reviews.text: It's cute gift. It's hard because it is a furry robot animal.
customer_reviews.author: Anais Herring

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: My 4 year old loves this! Plus he plays with it with another doctor set I bought him!
customer_reviews.author: Brit

customer_reviews.title: LOVE
customer_reviews.text: My little one absolutely loves this monkey, It's adorable too! GREAT BUY
customer_reviews.author: lesley sabatino

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and absolutely adorable!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for our (almost) 2 year old for Christmas and she absolutely loved it! It’s adorable and seems to be well made.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: I dont think i got as big of a deal as it claimed but it is cute.
customer_reviews.author: Avid Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Boring
customer_reviews.text: Monkey doesn't really do anything. We checked to make sure it wasn't in try me mode but nope, just kinda boring.
customer_reviews.author: Misty June Farley

customer_reviews.title: He is too cute!
customer_reviews.text: He is so cute! My 3 yr old twin grandsons like playing with him. I don't like to tilt his head to close his eyes. It's too hard for the kids.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Darling and easy to operate! A+++++
customer_reviews.text: This monkey is super cute. My Grand daughter loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Glenna Bethay

customer_reviews.title: Super cute
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my 3 year old for Christmas, she loved it!
customer_reviews.author: Guerreroclan

customer_reviews.title: Toy
customer_reviews.text: This was a xmas gift for my granddaughter and she loves it!!
customer_reviews.author: Krista

customer_reviews.title: Made me the BEST aunt!
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my great-niece and she loved it. She is four years old and this was the HIT gift. Glad she opened it last or the other presents would have never been opened!
customer_reviews.author: T. Ross

customer_reviews.title: super toy )
customer_reviews.text: very interesting toy. I especially liked to teach my daughter to get ready for bed.
customer_reviews.author: Yanna

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t work
customer_reviews.text: This does not work properly. The eyes don’t close when laid back. It’s supposed to cough and it doesn’t
customer_reviews.author: debra lohner jacobus

customer_reviews.title: Cute and soft
customer_reviews.text: Super soft and cute. Exactly what is pictured. My daughter fell in love with this monkey
customer_reviews.author: Mom of 5

customer_reviews.title: Its just okay
customer_reviews.text: Not what I expected. My granddaughter has played with it for about 30 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: J. Jones

customer_reviews.title: Loved it
customer_reviews.text: I brought two of these they were a great hit with my grandkids
customer_reviews.author: Rose Green

customer_reviews.title: Adorable
customer_reviews.text: This cute little monkey is adorable. Great for those kids who want to nurture and love animals.
customer_reviews.author: Wes thomas

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for a special little girl and she absolutely loves it
customer_reviews.author: Sandy

product_meta.title: furReal Check-up Zandi
product_meta.description: The Check-up Zandi pet is a sweet little monkey who’s ready for a check-up! Kids can use the stethoscope toy to listen to heartbeat sounds and pretend to take her temperature with the thermometer toy. As they soothe their little patient by petting her on the head, her eyes will open and close as she makes happy sounds. Seems like that check-up went just fine! furReal and all related properties are trademarks of Hasbro.
feature_bullets: Includes pet, thermometer toy, stethoscope toy, and instructions.
Ages 4 and up. 3 x 1.5v A76 alkaline batteries included.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars323 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
